entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
